name: Lucid Wonderland
description:
An art piece inspired by the stars under the night sky. The night meant to be seen as the means of escape from reality burdened by the dominance of the day. The dominant red stars latching onto the abstract blue voice of freedom spreading its parasitic ideals conquering it, with the whole substance ending into points of submissive breakdowns. Stare deep into the art piece and dive into the infinite world of Lucid Wonderland. Allow your imagination to implode and decipher the context of the art piece. A man battling a tiger, A beast driving a man to a corner, A pregnant mother protecting her child, etc. Only you determine what you see.

Disclaimer:
Be wary of prolonged concentration on the art piece!

Format: MP4
Resolution: 1920 x 1080 (FHD)
Unlockable: Access to original art piece upon purchase
